Professor Leo A* Martin, national president, has asked me to send you
information on the Association for Education by Radio-Television*
AERT is a non-profit organization, national in scope, which includes
?mong its members teachers and administrative people on all levels of educa¬
tion, commercial broadcasters, religious broadcasters, civic leaders, parents,
and representatives of many leading civic groups* This, then, provides a
truly national cross-section of those who are keenly interested in the further
exploration of the utilization and evaluation of educational radio and tele¬
vision materials, both in the commercial and non-commercial broadcasting
industry*
In addition to the publication of the AERT Journal, of which there are
eight issues annually, AERT has played an important role in the formation and
implementation of the Joint Committee on Educational Television* AERT also
serves as one of the sponsors of the National Tape Recording Catalog and
Re-recording Service, a project set up in cooperation with the Department of
Audio-Visual Instruction of the National Education Association* The annual
national convention of AERT members is held each year in conjunction with
the Ohio State Institute for Education by Radio and TV at Columbus, Ohio©
That AERT is equally concerned with both educational radio and educational
television is evidenced by the comprehensive articles on both media which
appear regularly in the AERT Journal* Submitted by Association members
themselves, these articles cover a diverse number of topics including areas
of communications theory, practical program and promotional ideas, helpful
how-to-do-it and how-to-find-it suggestions, as well as reports on listener
council and other evaluation activities*
The enclosed membership blank includes a complete statement of purposes
and advantages of membership in the Association* It is the feeling of the
officers and directors of AERT that the organization has a vital function in
cur society* Your support, as evidenced by your membership, will be richly
rewarded in the future significance of AERT in the field of educational radio
and television*
If you have further questions about AERT, please do not hesitate to
write*
